overview:
Zrc2.com is the Free Networking Community and Professional Services hub for IT & Telecom Professionals which has been created to provide a community and networking venue aimed specifically at individuals working or associated with the IT & Telecom industries.

The website offers a highly developed user interface offering practical functionality and offering pleasant user experience. It also features a suite of tools which allows members to present and promote themselves to the wider community in a manner of different ways, on both a professional and a social level. The user profile page allows users to interact with other site members via a comments feed, with which users are able to leave general comments; in addition, every member profile comes complete with a personal Blog and a notice board feature which is not unlike a mini â€œForumâ€, using which, members are able to conduct their own debates and discussions. The profile page also includes a gallery into which it is possible to upload up to a maximum of 200 images and also includes a professional section which features easily hidden details of an individualâ€™s skills, talents and experience, his or her work history, academic achievements and of course, their availability and contact details, dependent upon individual privacy settings.

Additionally, it is possible to create and establish groups, participate in discussion within the Forum or search for new career and business opportunities using the job search tool; every member is free to choose their own individual level of participation and involvement.

Standard membership is free of charge.

Revenue will come from affiliate relationships and advertising, particularly job posts.
